--------------------------------------------------
ID: C9YQL9G_00
From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-24 14:55
Subject: In Their Shoes: Patrick and Michael Chalhoub, FACES Sales, Goal Setting Reminder, IE Exclusive Discount
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/f1b31e1039d1903f9f2edaa45e37e0061825829916.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/bae572822cd7df79bfaf233472f5293a1318286681.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=543&user=10620> 	

Level Shoes unveils a special edition of their ‘In Their Shoes’ series, part of the seasonal ‘Come Together’ campaign, featuring an exclusive conversation with Patrick and Michael Chalhoub, as they celebrate the Group’s 70th anniversary. An inspiring story of family, visionary ambition, resilience, and unwavering passion—this feature captures a pivotal moment of transformation as the Group enters a new era. 
Captured together through the Level lens, they discuss the values that have defined their legacy, the evolution of the Group, and the enduring bond between father and son. 
Explore the full story here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=544&user=10620>

Level Shoes unveils a special edition of their ‘In Their Shoes’ series, part of the seasonal ‘Come Together’ campaign, featuring an exclusive conversation with Patrick and Michael Chalhoub, as they celebrate the Group’s 70th anniversary. An inspiring story of family, visionary ambition, resilience, and unwavering passion—this feature captures a pivotal moment of transformation as the Group enters a new era. 
Captured together through the Level lens, they discuss the values that have defined their legacy, the evolution of the Group, and the enduring bond between father and son. 
Explore the full story here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=544&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/f1b31e1039d1903f9f2edaa45e37e0061825829916.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-3-min.png> 	

Faces Ramadan Blockbuster & Staff Sale

Enjoy 25% staff discount and extra 10% off on the Ramadan Blockbuster, online and in store, from 24 March to 27 March


& 

25% staff discount and extra 10% off on everything using the discount code: STAFF10, online and in store from 24 March to 27 March. T&Cs apply

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/f4e2c8657178d5c0b6d827cda136694892771210.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-6-min.png> 	

Small Steps, Big Wins (6 days to go)

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=545&user=10620> 	

Did you know? Breaking big goals into smaller, actionable steps increases your chances of success.

chunks.text:
Small Steps, Big Wins (6 days to go)

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=545&user=10620> 	

Did you know? Breaking big goals into smaller, actionable steps increases your chances of success.

Take the first step by uploading your 2025 Goals in DRIVE before 31st March.

Need guidance? The Performance Management page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=545&user=10620>  has all the resources you need!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-7-min.png> 	

Discount on IE Business School Programs

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=546&user=10620> 	

We've just partnered with IE Business School effective from 2025 to 2027! Chalhoub Group team members can now enjoy an exclusive 25% discount on IE’s Executive Education programs, covering marketing, finance, leadership, digital transformation, and more. IE University offers flexible learning options, including full-time on-campus programs in Madrid and blended formats for working professionals.
Explore the programs here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=546&user=10620> 

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=547&user=10620>  

Copyright © 2025 Chalhoub Group. All rights reserved.
